N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 878.5 - Assigned classifications and standards of quality and purity

State Regulations

The classifications and standards of quality and purity
assigned to the surface waters specifically designated and described herein are
set forth in table I, subject to the definitions and conditions stated
above. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
878.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
